summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 THOR MIRAMAR RV WITH A 2015 FORD SUPER DUTY DRW F53 CHASSIS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS FAILED TO OPERATE IN RAINY OR INCLEMENT WEATHER. THE CONTACT HAD TO PULL OVER ONTO THE ROAD SHOULDER AND WAIT FOR THE RAIN OR INCLEMENT WEATHER TO STOP. THE RV WAS TAKEN TO CAROLINA CAMPERS AND RV (1705 US-601 MOCKSVILLE, NORTH CAROLINA 27028, (336) 753-0777) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR WAS NOT REPLACED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR WAS PREVIOUSLY REPLACED BY AN UNKNOWN DEALER, BUT THE REPAIR DID NOT CORRECT THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE OCCURRED FOR OVER THREE YEARS. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT HE RECENTLY RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V162000 (VISIBILITY). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 1,000.
